channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Inside the controversial tree farms powering Apple’s carbon neutral goal

item.description: Organizations are deepening their cloud investments at an unprecedented pace, recognizing its fundamental role in driving business agility and innovat...

item.title: Hasbro’s stock rallies as toy maker ups its revenue forecast for ‘Wizards of the Coast’
item.description: The toy company’s first-quarter results wowed Wall Street, but its outlook excluded any impact of tariffs due to uncertainty over trade negotiations.

item.title: Evil Geniuses and Theta Labs launch AI chatbot based on esports mascot Meesh
item.description: Evil Geniuses, the well-known esports organization and brand, has launched its Meesh AI chatbot in a partnership with Theta Labs.

item.title: Locus Robotics surpasses 5B picks with its warehouse automation
item.description: Locus Robotics said surging demand for warehouse automation has increased global adoption of its mobile robots. The post Locus Robotics surpasses 5B p...

item.title: ‘Bond king’ Jeffrey Gundlach predicts our next financial hangover — and it’s sobering
item.description: Easy money was never meant to last forever. Expect a 4% return on cash, 5% on bonds and 6% from stocks.

item.title: Near Earth Autonomy to deliver miniaturized autonomy systems for U.S. Marines
item.description: Near Earth Autonomy's technology allows aircraft to autonomously take off, fly, and land safely, with or without GPS. The post Near Earth Autonomy to ...

item.title: Comcast admits it is ‘not winning’ in fight to stanch broadband subscriber losses
item.description: Comcast has been struggling with falling broadband and cable subscriptions amid a broader industry decline.

item.title: The Download: Apple’s eucalyptus carbon bet, and climate tech’s bad vibes

item.title: Nintendo Switch 2 preorders crash GameStop after shoppers report similar bugs at Target, Best Buy and Walmart. Most retailers are out of stock.
item.description: Nintendo Switch 2 preorders went live on Thursday, and gamers are reporting all sorts of issues with the buying process.

item.title: ‘She’s kept him afloat’: I’m 78 and leaving my daughter, 41, my life savings, but her partner is a mooch. How can I protect her?
item.description: “He keeps losing jobs and going on unemployment.”

item.title: Helm.ai launches AV software for up SAE L4 autonomous driving
item.description: The new Helm.ai Driver predicts the future path of the self-driving vehicle in real time using only camera-based perception. The post Helm.ai launches...

item.title: Former DeepSeeker and collaborators release new method for training reliable AI agents: RAGEN
item.description: RAGEN stands out not just as a technical contribution but as a conceptual step toward more autonomous, reasoning-capable AI agents.

item.title: Google adds more AI tools to its Workspace productivity apps
item.description: Google expanded Gemini's features, adding the popular podcast-style feature Audio Overviews to the platform.

item.description: Enterprises can now make Studio Ghibli-inspired images through OpenAI's API.
